commit.message:
re PR c++/35327 (ICE with invalid constructor)

/cp
2008-06-07  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

        PR c++/35327
        * decl.c (grokdeclarator): In case of wrong return type return
	immediately error_mark_node.

/testsuite
2008-06-07  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

        PR c++/35327
        * g++.dg/parse/crash41.C: New.

From-SVN: r136518
